issue.title: [Python][Nightly] Wheel builds could NOT find ArrowPython
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7181](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7181). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See for example https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/612285565#L1088. I wonder if ARROW-5575 (https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5798) disrupted this?

`[~kou]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7181?focusedCommentId=16975430) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Oh, sorry.

How to run this on local? I'll try this.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7181?focusedCommentId=16975507) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
I could reproduce this by `docker-compose run --rm centos-python-manylinux2010`.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7181?focusedCommentId=16976093) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5850
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5850>
